title: Boeing Halting 737 Max Production, Ally’s Credit Card Plan, Positive Global Growth Heading into 2020
itunes:title: Boeing Halting 737 Max Production, Ally’s Credit Card Plan, Positive Global Growth Heading into 2020
description:
Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Airlines Analyst George Ferguson and Bloomberg News Aerospace Reporter Julie Johnsson, talk about Boeing halting production of the 737 Max. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Jenny Surane discusses auto lender Ally's credit card plan. Jon Adams, Senior Investment Strategist at BMO Global Asset Management, walks through positive global growth heading into 2020. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News P&I Reporter Monte Reel share insight on the volatile economics of the vanilla marketplace in Madagascar. And we Drive to the Close with Rob Croce, Senior Portfolio Manager at Mellon Investment.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
